item.title: Question type introduction
item.description: Question type introduction # English question type # langTypeï¼šen-US name mode Audio duration limit Reference text length limit phoneme phoneme 20 s 100 characters word word 20 s 100 characters sentence sentence 40 s 300 characters paragraphs chapter 300 s 10000 characters Chinese question type # langTypeï¼šzh-cmn-Hans-CN name mode Audio duration limit Reference text length limit phoneme phoneme 20 s 100 characters word word 20 s 50 characters sentence sentence 40 s 100 characters paragraphs chapter 300 s 1000 characters

item.title: - 1.appkey
item.description: appkey #

item.title: auth
item.description: auth #

item.title: English special label format
item.description: English special label format # In different English question types, the reference text (refText) supports the input of multiple annotation formats to meet the requirements of specific reading methods. When passing in parameters, use the corresponding annotation format directly in the refText field, for example: { "mode": "sentence", "refText": "It's mine, isn't it(t:1)?" } Question type is supported, which means that parameters are passed in according to the specified format, and scoring will be performed according to this format.

item.title: Hanyu Pinyin Scoring
item.description: Hanyu Pinyin Scoring # Limit # send audio up to 20 seconds long reference text up to 100 characters. Parameter # field type defaults remark mode string required phoneme refText string required Reference text, supporting consonants, rhymes, unvoiced syllables, voiced syllables, no more than 100 charactersOnly supports pinyin representation in SpeechEvalPro format â€”â€” Chinese special label format .

item.title: Phoneme Scoring
item.description: Phoneme Scoring # Limit # send audio up to 20 seconds long reference text up to 100 characters. Parameter # field type defaults remark mode string required phoneme refText string required reference text Only phoneme representation in SpeechEvalPro format is supported, see English Phonetic Symbol Comparison Table for details. Multiple phonetic symbols are separated by English spaces exampleï¼š

item.title: Public Parameters
item.description: Public Parameters # Evaluation parameters # field type remark defaults langType enum englishï¼šen-US chineseï¼šzh-cmn-Hans-CN required sampleRate int Audio sampling rate (Hz), currently only supports 16000 required connectTimeout int Connection ã€Heartbeat timeout (seconds), range: 5-60. 15 responseTimeout int Response timeout (seconds), range: 5-60. 15 scale int Scoring scale, range: 1-100 100 ratio float Score ad:justment coefficient, range: 0.

item.title: - 2.token
item.description: token #

item.title: Chinese special label format
item.description: Chinese special label format # In different Chinese question types, the reference text (refText) supports the input of multiple annotation formats to meet the requirements of specific reading methods. When passing in parameters, use the corresponding annotation format directly in the refText field, for example: { "mode": "word", "refText": "é•¿(zhang3)é•¿(chang2)" } Pass in the parameters according to the specified label format, and the score will be scored according to this format

item.title: eval
item.description: eval #

item.title: Word Scoring
item.description: Word Scoring # Limit # send audio up to 20 seconds long reference text up to 100 characters. Parameter # field type defaults remark mode string required word refText string required reference text Reference text support English special label format exampleï¼š { "mode":"word", "refText":"good morning" } Evaluation Results # A complete example of the JSON response result field type remark taskId string taskID timestamp integer task timestamp audioUrl string audio storage url (this field is only returned when the question type parameter audioUrl=true) audioInfo dict Audio Quality Information refText string reference text hypothesis string actual text read overall double total score (range determined by scale) accuracy double accuracy (range determined by point scale) waveTime integer actual recording timeï¼ˆmsï¼‰ startTime integer the starting reading position in a recording (ms)ï¼ˆmsï¼‰ endTime integer the ending reading position in a recording (ms)ï¼ˆmsï¼‰ wordInfo list<dict> array of word info objects (ğŸ‘‡) wordInfo # field type remark refText string reference text hypothesis string actual text read score double total score (range determined by scale) accuracy double word accuracy (range determined by point scale) rhythm dict **word rhythm info objects ** â”œâ”€ stressRef integer word stress label (1 means it should be accented, 0 means it shouldn’t be accented/do not check) â”œâ”€ stressScore integer word stress score (1 means actually agrees with label, 0 means doesn’t match/do not check) type string word type startTime integer the starting reading position in a recording (ms) endTime integer the ending reading position in a recording (ms) syllables list<dict> array of syllable info objects, refer to SpeechEvalPro scheme English Phonetic Symbol Comparison Table â”œâ”€ syllable string phonemic composition of syllables.

item.title: Word Scoring
item.description: Word Scoring # Limit # send audio up to 20 seconds long reference text up to 50 characters. Parameter # field type defaults remark mode string required word refText string required reference text Reference text support Chinese special label format exampleï¼š { "mode":"word", "refText":"æ—© æ—©ç‚¹" } Evaluation Results # A complete example of the JSON response result field type remark taskId string taskID timestamp integer task timestamp audioUrl string audio storage url (this field is only returned when the question type parameter audioUrl=true) audioInfo dict Audio Quality Information refText string reference text pinyin string pinyin transcription of the corresponding reference text (with tones) overall double total score (range determined by a point system)combines the toneless pronunciation of syllables (phn) and tones (toneScore) phn double pronunciation accuracy without tones (range determined by a point system) toneScore double overall tone score (range determined by point system) waveTime integer actual recording duration (ms) startTime integer the starting reading position in a recording (ms) endTime integer the ending reading position in a recording (ms) characters list<dict> array of characters info objects (ğŸ‘‡) characters # field type remark refText string reference text pinyin string pinyin transcription of the corresponding reference text (without tones) overall double total score (range determined by a point system)combines the toneless pronunciation of syllables (phn) and tones (toneScore) phn double pronunciation accuracy without tones (range determined by a point system) toneRef integer standard tones (0 to 4 for soft, one to four tones respectively) toneConfidence list<integer> tone confidence level (range 0 to 100, elements in order: soft, one to four) toneScore double overall tone score (range determined by point system) erRef int codified sound labels (1 means it should be pronounced, 0 means it should not be pronounced/not checked) erScore int score for paedophones (1 indicates actual agreement with label, 0 indicates actual inconsistency with label/no check) type string word type startTime integer the starting reading position in a recording (ms) endTime integer the ending reading position in a recording (ms) phonemes list<dict> array of phonemes info objects â”œâ”€ phoneme string transcription representation of sounds and rhymes â”œâ”€ score double vocalization score (range determined by point system) â”œâ”€ startTime integer the starting reading position in a recording (ms) â”œâ”€ endTime integer the ending reading position in a recording (ms)

item.title: - 3.ws
item.description: ws #

item.title: Other parameters
item.description: Other parameters # Character/phrase/phoneme type # The type field in the returned result of the evaluation indicates the word (word/phoneme) type, and the values are as follows: normalï¼šnormal insertï¼šrepeated read deleteï¼šmissed reading replaceï¼šmisspelled oovï¼šIndicates that the word (phrase) is not in the system library, and the word (phrase) cannot be scored

item.title: Sentence Scoring
item.description: Sentence Scoring # Limit # send audio up to 40 seconds long reference text up to 300 characters. can be set to enable real-time return results Evaluation parameters Parameter # field type defaults remark mode string required sentence refText string required reference text Reference text support English special label format exampleï¼š { "mode":"sentence", "refText":"Hi there.

item.title: Sentence Scoring
item.description: Sentence Scoring # Limit # send audio up to 40 seconds long reference text up to 100 characters. can be set to enable real-time return results Evaluation parameters Parameter # field type defaults remark mode string required sentence refText string required reference text Reference text support Chinese special label format phonemes boolean false whether or not to return sound and rhyme information exampleï¼š

item.description: example #

item.title: English Phonetic Symbol Comparison Table
item.description: English Phonetic Symbol Comparison Table # This document is used for the comparison and conversion of English phonetic symbols Vowel # Single Sound # ID SpeechEvalPro Scheme CMUBET KK DJ(2015) IPA(88) word example SpeechEvalPro Scheme Transcription Result 1 iy iy /i/ /i:/ eat iy t 2 ih ih /Éª/ /Éª/ it ih t 3 eh eh /É›/ /e/ bed b eh d 4 ae ae /Ã¦/ /Ã¦/ at ae t 5 aa aa /É‘/ /É‘:/ car k aa r 6 ao ao /É”/ /É”:/ tall t ao l 7 oo - - /É’/ ox oo k s 8 uw uw /u/ /u:/ too t uw 9 uh uh /ÊŠ/ /ÊŠ/ put p uh t 10 ah ah /ÊŒ/ /ÊŒ/ hut hh ah t 11 ax - /É™/ /É™/ of ax v Diphthongs # ID SpeechEvalPro Scheme CMUBET KK DJ(2015)

item.title: Paragraphs Scoring
item.description: Paragraph Scoring # Limit # send audio up to 300 seconds long reference text up to 10,000 characters. can be set to enable real-time return results Evaluation parameters Parameter # field type defaults remark mode string required chapter refText string required reference text Reference text support English special label format exampleï¼š { "mode":"chapter", "refText":"I believe there is a person who brings sunshine into your life.

item.title: Paragraphs Scoring
item.description: Paragraphs Scoring # Limit # send audio up to 300 seconds long reference text up to 1000 characters. can be set to enable real-time return results Evaluation parameters Parameter # field type defaults remark mode string required chapter refText string required reference text Reference text support Chinese special label format phonemes boolean false whether or not to return consonant vowel information exampleï¼š

That person may have enough to spread around.", "sentenceInfo":[ { "endTime":4390, "fluency":{ "overall":84.
